name: Forge TSA
trainWithUs:
Forge TSA are a collective of schools that cross 3 Local Authorities in the South Yorkshire area. We offer a bespoke package with a wealth of subject specialist knowledge in both locally and nationally acknowledged trainers. Cutting edge practice in teaching and assessment strategies are used to give students the best possible experience in the classroom. Make the most of our training facilities and breadth of teaching experience modeled across a variety of types of schools including Academy schools, LA maintained schools and voluntary aided church schools.
In 2021/22 we are continuing with our succesful Primary Education Training (5-11) for non salaried places.
trainWithDisability: Our bespoke package includes links to support from speech and language experts, expert SEND professionals and trained Mental Health First Aiders who can support pupils and students towards their academic potential
